2026-02-02.content:
Eventarc Standard is available in the `asia-southeast3` (Bangkok, Thailand)
[region](https://docs.cloud.google.com/eventarc/docs/locations#regions).

summary.title: Eventarc Standard available in Bangkok
summary.summary: Eventarc Standard is now available in the asia-southeast3 (Bangkok, Thailand) region. This expansion brings Eventarc's capabilities closer to users in Southeast Asia, improving latency and data locality.

2025-11-11.content:
Eventarc Advanced support for
[using access policies to control access](https://docs.cloud.google.com/eventarc/advanced/docs/control-publishing-access)
when publishing event messages to an Eventarc Advanced bus is available in
[Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: Eventarc Access Policies now in Preview
summary.summary: You can now use access policies to control access when publishing event messages to an Eventarc Advanced bus. This feature is in Preview.

2025-09-24.content: Eventarc Advanced support for [publishing events from multiple projects](https://cloud.google.com/eventarc/advanced/docs/publish-events/publish-events-google-sources#multiple-projects) is available in [Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: Eventarc supports publishing events from multiple projects
summary.summary: Eventarc now supports publishing events from multiple projects, a feature that is currently in Preview.

summary.title: Eventarc Advanced GA
summary.summary: Eventarc Advanced is now generally available.

2025-08-01.content: Eventarc Advanced is available in the `asia-south1` (Mumbai, India), `europe-north1` (Hamina, Finland), and `us-east4` (Ashburn, Virginia, North America) [regions](https://cloud.google.com/eventarc/docs/locations#advanced-regions).

summary.title: Eventarc Advanced regions
summary.summary: Eventarc Advanced is now available in new regions.

2025-08-01.content: There is a limit of one `MessageBus` resource per project per region, and a limit of one `GoogleApiSource` resource per project per region. For more information, see [Quotas and limits](https://cloud.google.com/eventarc/docs/quotas).

summary.title: Quotas and limits for Eventarc resources
summary.summary: There is a limit of one MessageBus resource per project per region, and a limit of one GoogleApiSource resource per project per region.
